about.title: Meet Your English Teacher
about.intro1: Hello! I'm Evgenia Penkova, the founder of TinyTalks. With over 5 years of experience teaching English, I've helped hundreds of students achieve their language learning goals.
about.intro2: My teaching philosophy is simple: language learning should be enjoyable, personalized, and focused on real communication. I believe that every student has the potential to master English when given the right support and guidance.
about.intro3: At TinyTalks, we specialize in taking beginners to B1 level proficiency through a combination of structured lessons, conversational practice, and engaging activities. Whether you're learning for work, travel, or personal growth, I'm here to support you every step of the way.
about.cta: Let's embark on this English learning journey together!

reviews.title: What Our Students Say
reviews.description: Don't just take our word for it - hear from students who have transformed their English skills

anna.content: Evgenia is an amazing teacher! She helped me improve my English from beginner to B1 level in just 8 months. Her lessons are always engaging and fun. I highly recommend TinyTalks!

dmitry.content: I was always afraid to speak English, but Evgenia created such a comfortable learning environment. Now I can confidently communicate with international clients. Thank you!

maria.content: The personalized approach made all the difference. Every lesson was tailored to my needs and interests. I've never enjoyed learning a language this much!

pavel.content: After trying several English courses, I finally found TinyTalks. The one-on-one lessons helped me progress faster than I ever thought possible. Worth every penny!

elena.content: Evgenia's teaching methods are fantastic! She uses real-life situations and interesting materials. My speaking skills have improved dramatically in just 3 months.

sergei.content: Professional, patient, and always prepared. Evgenia is the best English teacher I've ever had. I went from struggling with basics to holding conversations!
